task: Search for a 'virtual reality' related repository on GitHub updated in the last 10 days with at least 200 stars and summarize its main objective. Current date is: 2025-01-04.
observation:
The most recent observations indicate that the repository 'aframevr/aframe' on GitHub meets the specified criteria, being a web framework for building virtual reality experiences. It has over 16.8k stars and was updated 4 days ago. A-Frame simplifies the creation of VR and AR scenes in the browser utilizing technologies like WebGL and three.js. It allows for easy integration with HTML, making it accessible for developers and enthusiasts. The framework supports multiple platforms and is optimized for performance, supporting an entity-component architecture for modular and reusable components.
